评论概述: Not exactly as advertised but I needed a backpack
评论详情: Dimensions for handgun is not 9" x 7" as stated in ad...my 7" x 5" 9mm barely fits and I can't close the zipper completely....it's almost better than nothing but, come on... advertise properly....I think they made the handgun compartment smaller & the cell phone compartment bigger as I have purchased these backpacks in the past...no the most ling lasting but the USED TO HAVE A HANDGUN COMPARTMENT THAT WORKED!... disappointed but the wallet is almost a whole nother purse so I'll use it until I find something better (they usually only last about a year anyway with this cheap pleather material)
It’s perfect for me! A lot of necessary pockets, secure and a lot of room. Well made. Looks amazing!!

I'd gotten bags from the big concealed carry company before and they were really nice, but this backpack blows them out of the water!  I love that the main compartment is not divided and has a couple of little pockets inside, and the straps are a great length.  I carry a .380 and there's plenty of room to comfortably stash and grab my gun. The empty bag is pretty heavy and the leather & embroidery are amazing quality. LOVE that the wallet came with both a wrist and shoulder strap too! If you're a licensed concealed carry person and you love the Day of the Dead motif, go for it, this bag is absolutely worth it!!

Received the bag within two days of ordering it. I love the color, size and feel of it, it's almost buttery in texture. It fits a lot inside. I can carry a book, a notebook, my planner, makeup/essentials bag, pencil bag, wallet, glasses case all with spare room for more. The straps were a little rigid in the beginning because its new but I was able to adjust them easily. I feel that with time I will break the purse in and it will be less rigid and more malleable with the wear and tare, making it an even more lovable bag. I hope and expect for it to last a long time. The matching wallet is fantastic and  made with the same great care. I would recommend this bag to others. I hope to gift it to others too!
